subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: While just 1.6 percent of teams from the four major sports have rallied from a 3-0 deficit to win a series, the N.H.L. has experienced a slightly better victory rate of 2.3 percent.
snippet: While just 1.6 percent of teams from the four major sports have rallied from a 3-0 deficit to win a series, the N.H.L. has experienced a slightly better victory rate of 2.3 percent.
